MessageDecoder - Class in org.epzilla.leader.message
This is the RMI message decoder class which is used to receive RMI messages and decode the message and identify the meaning of the message and then fire the relevant epzilla event to handle the logic.

This is the class used to generate messages to send using RMI to other nodes.

This interface defines the message IDs which are sent in RMI messages.

MulticastMessageDecoder - Class in org.epzilla.common.discovery.dispatcher
This is the multicast message decoder for the dispatcher and all the messages received to the dispatcher multicast listener.

MulticastMessageDecoder - Class in org.epzilla.common.discovery.node
This is the multicast message decoder of the cluster nodes and the received multicast messages are sent here and necessary actions are taken from here.

MulticastReceiver - Class in org.epzilla.common.discovery.multicast
This is a service class where all the multicasting components will use this class to receive the incoming multicasting messages from other components.
